# 9.0 Docs

## Cryptography

- [APIs Removed from System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs netstandard2.0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/9.0/api-removed-pkcs.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 9 where certain APIs were removed from System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs netstandard2.0.
- [SafeEvpPKeyHandle.DuplicateHandle up-refs the handle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/9.0/evp-pkey-handle.md): Learn about the .NET 9 breaking change in cryptography where SafeEvpPKeyHandle.DuplicateHandle now increments the reference count of the EVP_PKEY handle instead of creating a new instance.
- [Some X509Certificate2 and X509Certificate constructors are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/9.0/x509-certificates.md): Learn about the .NET 9 breaking change in cryptography where X509Certificate2 and X509Certificate constructors for binary and file content are obsolete.
- [Windows private key lifetime simplified](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/9.0/private-key-lifetime.md): Learn about the .NET 9 breaking change in cryptography where the lifetime of a Windows private key has been simplified.
